Summary: black grayish domes with three lights at rim one light above
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around July 23rd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMy 10 year old grand daughter was watching iPod on floor apprx 10 feet away from where I was sitting, she was lying on floor in room with lights off jumps up runs to window screaming with excitement not fear. I hear the strange noise. It is not a plane we live near the airport and I know what planes sound like. She tells me it was just above the trees near a cloud and went up high and over the building with the noise. Her words were: It looked like a FAKE alien UFO! I had her describe it and draw it. She stayed at the window looking for it again.
